testcase.name: App - Step 1: Basic Payment List > should fetch and display payments in a table with page=1 and pageSize=5
App - Step 2: Search by Payment ID > should have a search input for payment ID
App - Step 2: Search by Payment ID > should search for payments by payment ID
App - Step 3: Clear Filters > should clear all filters when clear button is clicked
App - Step 4: Handle Payment Not Found > should display error message when payment ID is not found
App - Step 5: Handle Server Error > should display error message when API returns 500
App - Step 6: Currency Filter > should have a currency filter dropdown
App - Step 6: Currency Filter > should filter payments by currency when selected
App - Step 7: Combined Currency and Payment ID Filter > should filter by both currency and payment ID
App - Step 8: Pagination > should display pagination controls
App - Step 8: Pagination > should disable previous button on first page
